alert.note: Alert for Chilton; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 10 at 1:03AM CST until December 10 at 1:45AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Talladega County in east central Alabama... Northeastern Chilton County in central Alabama... Southeastern Shelby County in central Alabama... Northwestern Coosa County in east central Alabama... * Until 145 AM CST. * At 102 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Westover to near Talladega Springs to near Gap Of The Mountain, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oxford, Talladega, Sylacauga, Pell City, Clanton, Childersburg, Columbiana, Jemison, Wilsonville, Talladega Springs, Stewartville, Weogufka, Lincoln, Vincent, Thorsby, Harpersville, Munford, Westover, Oak Grove, and Waldo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for central and east central Alabama.
